content: I'll definitely look into those fertilizers and repot my orchid into a pot with better drainage. Speaking of plants that need attention, my basil plant has been doing great since I repotted it on March 5th, and I've been using it a lot in my cooking, like in that delicious pesto pasta dish I made on March 15th. Do you have any tips on how to deal with the tiny whiteflies I've been noticing around it?
